name: ListFilesUnderRetentionPolicy
description:
Retrieve files under a retention policy assignment.

This tool fetches a list of files that are under retention for a given retention policy assignment ID. It should be called when you need to identify files associated with a specific retention policy.

parameters.name: retention_policy_assignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the retention policy assignment used to identify which retention policy's files to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The ID of the retention policy assignment.

parameters.name: position_marker
parameters.description: A string to define where to start returning results for pagination using marker-based pagination. Requires `usemarker` to be `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of files to retrieve per page. Determines the page size for the results.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.
